Zurückführen lässt sich das auf einen Minderwertigkeitskomplex.
Ihr sucht nach etwas, das Ihr für noch minderwertiger haltet als euch selbst!
Ihr seid unzufrieden mit euch selbst.(verständlicherweise)

to netweasel.
FUCK you. i am german. deine verblödete rhetorik kannst du dir sparen, du hund. the fact is, zionists, israel, the ZOG, whatever the fuck you wanna callem are just a small cog in the gigantic machine that is here to enslave us all, no more or less important than the media mafia, almost all puppet governments(the u.s. being the biggest of them), the fucking NAZI greenies, and all the other heads of the hydra. i havent seen this movie yet, but to understand facism you have to realize it is basicallly a diseased child of monetarism. in other words, financial capitalism, where you simply make money with interest and by raping lands of their resources, versus industrial capitalism, where you actually produce something.
but back to jews, the ZOG, the JCN, whatever. it is completely true that the "zionists" and the "nazis" worked together. basically, every war in the last 200 years and probably long before that has been started, funded, and kept afire by the same incestious asshole bloodline that has been keeping humanity down for who knows how long. in the case of ww2 these are well documented facts, not speculations. read for example: CONJURING HITLER: HOW BRITAIN AND AMERICA MADE THE THIRD REICH. you can find it right here on the bay. hitler was an english agent, same as lenin. basically both world wars were in order to stop a russo-german pact that would have changed the face of the earth, for better or for worse.  back to netweasel: germans are so scared of being called racist its depressing. the whole guilt trip that has been laid upon us for ww2 has severly fucked up german society in my opinion, even 60 years later. everywhere are monuments about it, you CANNOT turn on the tv in the evening without some fuckin ww2 doku that is full of the usual shit. german kids have become soft and faggy, always being told you should avoid conflict. and if you say ANYTHING, i mean ANYTHING against israel here, even if it is completely based on facts, your career is fuckin over. anyhoo, research, find out the facts, they are all out there. dont believe me, whatever you do. the truth is never in one place, and there is never only one bad guy. shit doesnt just happen, like wars and assasinations and coup de etats, it is all carefully orchestrated towards the goal of a global government and population reduction.
